text: z *(1,6,0) r/o 9, : : y 6 . X Spherical coordinates (7, 6, @) as often = used in mathematics: radial distance 7, azimuthal angle 6, and polar angle ¢. The meanings of 6 and ¢ have been swapped compared to the physics convention. As in physics, p (rho) is often used instead of r, to avoid confusion with the value 7 in cylindrical and 2D polar coordinates.
